CustomField.formula: IF(New_Customer_Email__c= True || New_Customer_Attachment__c = True || New_Portal_Case_Comment__c = True || Priority_Has_Changed__c =True, image("/img/samples/flag_green.gif",""),"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A green flag indicates that a new reply been received from the customer via email, case comment or case attachment
CustomField.label: Customer Reply - Action Needed
